00050 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00051 |   AP4_OhdrAtom
00052 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00053 class AP4_OhdrAtom : public AP4_ContainerAtom
00054 {
00055 public:
00056     // class methods
00057     static AP4_OhdrAtom* Create(AP4_Size         size, 
00058                                 AP4_ByteStream&  stream, 
00059                                 AP4_AtomFactory& atom_factory);
00060 
00061     // constructor
00062     AP4_OhdrAtom(AP4_UI08        encryption_method, 
00063                  AP4_UI08        padding_scheme,
00064                  AP4_UI64        plaintext_length,
00065                  const char*     content_id,
00066                  const char*     rights_issuer_url,
00067                  const AP4_Byte* textual_headers,
00068                  AP4_Size        textual_headers_size);
00069 
00070     // methods
00071     virtual AP4_Result InspectFields(AP4_AtomInspector& inspector);
00072     virtual AP4_Result WriteFields(AP4_ByteStream& stream);
00073     virtual AP4_Atom*  Clone();
00074 
00075     // accessors
00076     AP4_UI08          GetEncryptionMethod()   const { return m_EncryptionMethod; } 
00077     void              SetEncryptionMethod(AP4_UI08 encryption_method) { m_EncryptionMethod = encryption_method; }
00078     AP4_UI08          GetPaddingScheme()      const { return m_PaddingScheme;    }
00079     void              SetPaddingScheme(AP4_UI08 padding_scheme) { m_PaddingScheme = padding_scheme; }
00080     AP4_UI64          GetPlaintextLength()    const { return m_PlaintextLength;  }
00081     const AP4_String& GetContentId()          const { return m_ContentId;        }
00082     const AP4_String& GetRightsIssuerUrl()    const { return m_RightsIssuerUrl;  }
00083     const AP4_DataBuffer& GetTextualHeaders() const { return m_TextualHeaders;   }
00084 
00085 private:
00086     // methods
00087     AP4_OhdrAtom(AP4_UI32         size, 
00088                  AP4_UI32         version,
00089                  AP4_UI32         flags,
00090                  AP4_ByteStream&  stream,
00091                  AP4_AtomFactory& atom_factory);
00092 
00093     // members
00094     AP4_UI08       m_EncryptionMethod;
